modName: Monster Mounts Dawnguard - Montures Monstres Dawnguard
summary:
Adds 42 new Mounts in Riverwood

Ajoute 42 nouvelles Montures dans Rivebois

7 Fully Flyable Mounts with the version 1.5.1 ( Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) is Required)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00][b] Version 1.4.1[/b][/color] and [color=#00ff00][b] Version 1.5.1[/b][/color] (SKSE version)

This mod adds 42 mounts (version 1.5.1) or 41 (version 1.4.1) IN and NEAR Riverwood

[color=#00ff00][b]7 Fully Flyable Mounts with the version 1.5.1[/b][/color] ([url=http://skse.silverlock.org/] Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) [/url] is Required)
[i] Chaurus Hunter, Chaurus Hunter Fledgling, Soul Wisp, Death Wing, Red Naga, Swamp Naga, Skeleton Mistman[/i]

[color=#00ff00]Optional Files: Esp Version Française [/color]


There is two other "Monster Mounts": [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20351 ]MONSTER MOUNTS - MONTURES MONSTRES[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31538]MONSTER MOUNTS Dragonborn[/url] (Requires Dragonborn !)

[img]https://i.imgur.com/Jl6DLO9.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000] [size="7"][b]IN and NEAR RIVERWOOD :[/b][/size] [/color]

This mod adds to RIVERWOOD the following mounts (all "essential") available straight away:


1)[color=#f4a460] [b]Vampire Lord Male and Female [/b][/color](3)

[color=#ff0000]Loke/JN273 [/color] for his mesh (armor) of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22621 ] Vampire Lord Armor[/url]

[color=#00ff00][i] If you want to have a PERMANENTLY FLYING with your mount: (E) then run and fly with the mount (Z + Alt), then type on E to dismount: your mount is permanently flying ! (to stop: Left Ctrl)

Si vous voulez faire VOLER INDEFINIMENT votre monture : (E) puis courez et volez avec la monture (Z + Alt), tapez alors sur E pour descendre : votre monture est en VOL permanent ! (pour stopper: Left Ctrl)

Just to LEVITATE: (Left Ctrl) (to stop: Left Ctrl again)

Pour LEVITER simplement : (Left Ctrl) (pour se poser: à nouveau Left Ctrl) [/i][/color]

(-in my configuration- A little bug with the cloaks)

2)[color=#f4a460] [b] Gargoyle[/b][/color] (4)

3)[color=#f4a460] [b] Husky and Armored Husky [/b][/color]

4)[color=#f4a460] [b]Vale Deer[/b][/color]

5)[color=#f4a460] [b]Chaurus Hunter[/b][/color] (2)

6)[color=#f4a460] [b]Frozen Falmer and Female Falmer[/b][/color]

7)[color=#f4a460] [b] Skeleton horse [/b][/color] (Arvak)

8)[color=#f4a460] [b] Frozen Chaurus[/b][/color]

9)[color=#f4a460] [b] Skeleton Boneman[/b][/color] (2)

10)[color=#f4a460] [b] Death Hound[/b][/color]

11)[color=#f4a460] [b] Vale Sabre Cat [/b][/color]

[color=#ff0000]Testiger2 and XP32[/color] for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45542/?] Sabrecat Idle Animation Fix [/url] ("Permission : Free according to original tweaker/modder -testiger2-")

12)[color=#f4a460] [b]Troll Frost Armored and Troll Armored[/b][/color]

13)[color=#f4a460] [b]Draugr Skeleton Wrathman[/b][/color]

14)[color=#f4a460] [b] Daedra SpiderWoman[/b][/color]

15)[color=#f4a460] [b]Harpy [/b][/color]

[color=#ff0000]Dogtown1[/color] for the meshes and textures of : « Daedra SpiderWoman », « Harpy »

16)[color=#f4a460] [b]Death Wing [/b][/color] If your mount disappears(with impossibility to dismount): Zoom out with the scroll Wheel or FAST TRAVEL

17) [color=#f4a460][b]Red Naga[/b][/color] If your mount disappears(with impossibility to dismount): Zoom out with the scroll Wheel or FAST TRAVEL

18) [color=#f4a460][b]Swamp Naga[/b][/color] If your mount disappears(with impossibility to dismount): Zoom out with the scroll Wheel or FAST TRAVEL

[color=#ff0000]Dogtown1[/color]for the meshes of “Death Wing” and “nagas” (Model from [color=#ff8c00]DigitalLion[/color]); in the “Skyrim Monster Mod” version 10 ; [color=#ff0000]lifestorock[/color] for the textures of “Red Naga” and “Swamp Naga” in his “Skyrim Immersive Creatures” , Version 2 and 3 ; and [color=#ff0000]Bellyache[/color] for his new textures of the dragons in "Bellyaches New Dragon Species and Ohdaviing Replacer"

19)[color=#f4a460] [b] Female Atronach [/b][/color]

[color=#ff0000]mingyannuzhiming [/color] for the meshes and textures of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22740] atronach frost female [/url]

20)[color=#f4a460] [b] Demonic Horse [/b][/color]

[color=#ff0000] newermind43[/color] for the mesh of[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14596] Demonic Horse [/url]

21)[color=#f4a460] [b] Draman Skeleton [/b][/color]

[color=#ff0000]Grohiik [/color] for the mesh of the[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16659] Draman Skeleton [/url]

22)[color=#f4a460] [b] Spiderman[/b][/color] (« frostbitespidergiant race »)...only for the fun, because it is not the world of skyrim !

[color=#ff0000] FancyPantz[/color] for the meshes and textures of[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4308] Spiderman[/url] (Nexus)

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=7728&searchtext=piderman] Spiderman [/url] (Workshop)

23)[color=#f4a460] [b] Soul Wisp [/b][/color]

24)[color=#f4a460] [b]Frost Giant[/b][/color] [color=#00ff00][i]You have to take out your weapon then left click on the mouse to move forward faster[/i] [/color]

25)[color=#f4a460] [b]Dwarven Centurion Forgemaster [/b][/color]

26)[color=#f4a460] [b] Spriggan Earth Mother[/b][/color]

27)[color=#f4a460] [b] Ancient Frost Atronach[/b][/color]

28)[color=#f4a460] [b]Skeleton Mistman[/b][/color][color=#00ff00][i] take out your weapon…[/i] [/color]

29)[color=#f4a460] [b]Draugr Keeper [/b][/color] [color=#00ff00][i]take out your weapon…[/i] [/color] (-in my configuration- A little bug with the left foot)

30)[color=#f4a460] [b]Falmer Warmonger [/b][/color]

31)[color=#f4a460] [b]Shellbug[/b][/color] In the Dead -wild- Shellbug, you have also an item to make the [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Shellbug_Helmet ] Shellbug Helmet[/url]

In the game, you have Shellbug, but you can't mount it ! [url= http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N3Uk8d6Nm9g] Skyrim: Dawnguard - Where to Find Both Shellbugs ?[/url]

[color=#ff0000]Vicn [/color] for his mod [url=http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-36.html] Vicn Creature Resource [/url] with the mesh of the Shellbug (”You can use any parts of this mod without my permission.”)

32)[color=#f4a460] [b]Armored Vampire Dog [/b][/color]

[color=#ff0000]tumbajamba[/color] for the Mesh of the Armored Vampire Dog (« i decided to upload all my unreleased mount models as a modder resources ») in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8978/?]Armored SabreCat Mount [/url]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]AhJqwTc3rt0[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[color=#ff0000] [size="9"][b] Controls with the Fully Flyable Mounts [/b] [/size] [/color] ONLY for the [color=#00ff00][b]version 1.5.1 [/b][/color]([url=http://skse.silverlock.org/] Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) [/url] is Required)


[color=#ff0000]UP[/color]: [color=#00ff00] Left Shift[/color]

[color=#ff0000]DOWN[/color]: [color=#00ff00] Left Ctrl[/color]

[color=#ff0000]DOWN to the ground quickly[/color]: [color=#00ff00] E or Space[/color]

[color=#00ff00] W[/color] (or Z): [color=#ff0000]forward[/color]

[color=#00ff00] S[/color]: [color=#ff0000]backward[/color]

[color=#00ff00] A[/color] (or Q): [color=#ff0000]turn left[/color]

[color=#00ff00] D[/color]: [color=#ff0000]turn right[/color]

When flying press [color=#ff0000]F12 [/color] to reconfigure the Keys (...a little problem: it is the default screenshot button on Steam ! You can go into Steam and disabled screenshots)

If there is a problem with the F12 key, uncheck the mod, make a backup and then check again the mod

[i] You only have to be careful to not crash into the ground (apparently they can also burrow underground) !

(With my setup !) I often need to restart the game a second time, in order to fly (problem with SKSE ?)[/i]


[color=#ff8c00]NoxyGame[/color] and [color=#ff8c00]DOSMaster[/color] for the script of the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29860/? ] Pegasus MLP fully flyable [/url] “feel free to use/enhance the script/nif/mod, but give credits to the authors”




[color=#ff0000] [size="7"][b]IMPORTANT[/b][/size] [/color]

1)THE DLC DAWNGUARD is required

2) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001

These settings allow you to see all mounts correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not.

3) You must place the. esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to avoid getting the [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YhRezz10NOo ] swimming bug...[/url]

But if you have my other mod[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20351/ ] MONSTER MOUNTS - MONTURES MONSTRES[/url][i] you must choose the one OR the other one !!!! [/i]




[color=#ff0000] [size="7"][b]INSTALLATION and UNINSTALLATION[/b][/size] [/color]

[color=#ff8c00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

1) With « 7 – zip » -or other- (right click) you must unzip the downloaded file: “Monster Mounts Dawnguard BSA Archive 1-x”

2) You have a folder: “Data” (with 2 files: “Monster Mounts Dawnguard.bsa” and “Monster Mounts Dawnguard.esp”)

You have to put this folder « Data » in "…Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#ff8c00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

3) When you start the game, in "data files", you must check " Monster Mounts Dawnguard.esp " at the bottom of the list.....OK.....play

To uninstall, simply remove these files ! (if you have forgotten which files these are, simply unzip the folder of the mod again, and then find the same in Data).




[color=#ff0000] [size="6"][b]BUGS or PROBLEMS[/b][/size] [/color]

You have to place the. esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to avoid getting the [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YhRezz10NOo ] "swimming bug”[/url]

You have to take out your weapon then left click on the mouse to move forward faster with the Giant

If you dismount in the water with the SHELLBUG, it is possible to swim in the air !! Solution: MOUNT AGAIN or SPACEBAR

If you have any problem with these mounts, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...



[color=#ff0000] Video [/color] with my two Mods [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20351 ]Monster Mounts [/url] + Monster Mounts Dawnguard

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]T7IHXLyp-64[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-



With my mods, you have other Fully Flyable Mounts!

11 Fully Flyable Mounts with the version 2.7 of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20351/?] Monster Mounts [/url]:
[color=#00ff00]Green Atronach, Magic Anomaly, Flame, Stormy, Paalaz, Pazuzu, Spectrum, Fire, Mjöllnir, Azraël, Nerthus [/color]

9 Fully Flyable Mounts with the version 2.6 of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31538/?] Monster Mounts Dragonborn [/url]:
[color=#00ff00]Bone Storm, Ash Guardian, Aazidal, Dukaan, Seeker, Netch, Flying Shoggoth, Spectral Dragon, Flying Scrib [/color]

6 Fully Flyable Mounts ([color=#00ff00]Blood/Reptilian/Pebbled/Swamp/Peat Bog Chaurus Hunters + Flying Scrib[/color]) in
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59433/?]Fully Flying Chaurus Hunters[/url]

And 58 Dragons in my mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61101/?] Fully Flying Dragons [/url]
author: gg77

files.name: Monster Mounts Dawnguard 1-5-1 SKSE version
files.changelogHtml: New in the version 1.5.1: 7 Fully Flyable Mounts -Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) is Required- (Chaurus Hunter, Chaurus Hunter Fledgling, Soul Wisp, Death Wing, Red Naga, Swamp Naga, Skeleton Mistman) + Adds an Armored Vampire Dog + Adds Sabrecat Idle Animation Fix by testiger2 + Reduction of the size for some textures (for less CTD with a few configurations)
